summary: This is an email chain from August 15, 2019, regarding a wellness check on an individual at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The email indicates an officer returned a call stating the individual appeared fine and in good spirits.

persons.name: C Captain
persons.context: The email is addressed to this person, who is a captain at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The email chain involves a wellness check.

events.title: Wellness Check at MCC
events.description: An officer returned a call regarding a wellness check on an individual at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, reporting the individual appeared fine and in good spirits.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 15, 2019, concerning a wellness check at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
An officer reported the individual in question appeared 'fine and in good spirits' during the check.
The email indicates prior attempts to contact the individual by phone were unsuccessful, prompting the wellness check.
